DISABLED:
**Slow-mode is zojuist uitgeschakeld in {{channel}}!**

:arrow_right_hook: *Stuur `{{prefix}}slowmode [#channel] (time)` om hem weer in te schakelen!*
ENABLED:
**A slow-mode of `{{time}}` has just been enabled in `{{channel}}`!**

:arrow_right_hook: *Send `{{prefix}}slowmode {{channel}}` to disable it!*
PLEASE_WAIT: Channel {{channel}} is in slowmode! Please wait {{time}} between each message!
